description: Serilog classes (currently only action enrichers) for logging with ASP.NET MVC
releaseNotes:
Beta release. Package dependencies changed to lower versions of MVC and Serilog.

      Available Serilog enrichers:
      MvcControllerActionMethodEnricher: Enrich with action method signature.
      MvcControllerActionMethodEnricher: Enrich with action method signature.
      MvcControllerActionNameEnricher: Enrich with action name.
      MvcControllerNameEnricher: Enrich with controller name.
      MvcControllerTypeEnricher: Enrich with controller type.
      MvcControllerActionResultEnricher: Enrich with action result type (available after action execution in views etc.)
      MvcControllerCustomEnricher: Make your own enricher as a lamda function based on data made available as arguments.
      LoggerConfiguration loggerConfiguration = new LoggerConfiguration()
      .Enrich.With(new MvcControllerCustomEnricher((contexts, logEvent, propertyFactory) =>
      {
      logEvent.AddPropertyIfAbsent(propertyFactory.CreateProperty("IsChildAction", contexts.ActionExecuting.IsChildAction));
      }))
title: SerilogWeb.Mvc
